items.title: Image 1
items.description: If you're a Mac user, have you ever found it inconvenient that there's no quick shortcut to export DOCX files to PDF? Imagine being able to select one or more Word documents, right-click, and instantly see an option to export them to PDF - no need to open each file individually. Just two clicks, and you're done. Simple, fast, and efficient. Wouldn’t that be a game-changer?
